title: Vandar's War
description: Vandar's War Reese Gabriel "This is book 6 in the More Than Male series." Commander Vandar has been fighting the dreaded Narthians for years but he's about to face the challenge of a lifetime in the form of a feisty fem doctor sent to study the effects of combat on his troops. Reeva is as strong-willed as she is beautiful and she's not about to take orders-especially not from the stubborn warrior she nicknames "Vandarsaurus Rex" because of his refusal to adapt to new ideas. The heat of conflict erupts into blazing desire as they push the boundaries of their attraction. Will she succeed in taming him or will she find herself succumbing to his natural dominance?
author: Reese Gabriel
